thread.title: Weather hit Germany wine production in 2023
thread.title_full: Weather hit Germany wine production in 2023

author: Eszter Racz
title: Weather hit Germany wine production in 2023
text:
Wine production in Germany dropped by almost 4% last year, hit by weather conditions, government data shows.
